It's funny how once you start practicing something, you notice it everywhere.

On of the exercises in [Building a Second Brain](https://www.buildingasecondbrain.com/) is to keep a list of your 12 most important questions explicitly listed somewhere so they can percolate in your brain as you move through the world.

One of my favorite media professors, Jay Rosen, posted a refresher to his top problems in Pressthink, which I'd forgotten he regularly does.
